channel.title: NPC problems

item.title: NPC problems
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Not sure how to make it random but for the monster attacking a player with a certain cape you could maybe do
If(player.wield == capeid)
setnpcgetsannoyed = false;
else
true;

This will NOT work if you put it in, you need to add brackets and stuff, this just gives u an idea.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC problems
item.dc:creator: @Gfx Gfx
item.description:
@Gfx wrote:

Okay, I’m wanting to make it so when I click this object, I want a random NPC to spawn, this is it atm,

if(objectID == 4950){ if(playerHasItem(3706, 5)){ deleteItem(3706, 5); sM("You use your tokens to create an NPC"); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1, 3565, 3286, 0); } else sM("You need atleast 5 tokens to spawn an NPC!"); }

I’m wanting it so the NPC (1), to be random, please help.

Also, how do I make it so, when you spawn the NPC, it doesn’t attack anyone on your team? I’m making this minigame, but is their anyway I can do it so if they are wearing a certain cape, then NPC wont attack them? Or you can’t attack the NPC?

Read full topic
